text: Alessandro Canelli (born 9 June 1971 in Novara) is an Italian politician. He is a member of the right-wing populist party Lega Nord. Canelli was elected Mayor of Novara on 19 June 2016 and took his office on 21 June. ==See also== *2016 Italian local elections *List of mayors of Novara ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Novara Category:Lega Nord politicians
title: Alessandro Canelli
